ExampleSentences.Sentence: I am ready to elope with her and get married.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Jestem gotowy z nią uciec i wziąć ślub.)

ExampleSentences.Sentence: They wanted to elope and wed. They still can do that.
ExampleSentences.Translation: (Oni chcieli uciec i pobrać się. Oni wciąż mogą to zrobić.)
